Class Car

java.lang.Object
  Car

public class Car
extends java.lang.Object

Describes Car objects that can be moved and turned to left or right. Designed for a simulation of roads and traffic lights. You can make a new car (specify the (x,y) position, and its colour) drive(double dist) makes it move it forward by some distance, left() and right() make it turn it left or right.

Constructor Summary
Car(double x, double y, java.awt.Color col)
          Construct a new Car object; parameters are the position and colour of the car.
 
Method Summary
 void drive(double dist)
          Make the car move a distance in its current direction
 void left()
          turn the car 90 degrees to the left
 void right()
          turn the car 90 degrees to the right
